# AUDIO::CAN_VEHICLE_RECEIVE_CB_RADIO

## Summary
Check if the vehicle can currently receive CB radio (ie. it has a capable radio and is in range of a transmitter)

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** veh

## Returns
* **BOOL**
